parts.text:
To give you the most accurate weather information, I need to know your **location**!

Please tell me your **city and state/country**, or even a **zip code/postal code**, and I'll do my best to provide the current conditions.

Alternatively, you can easily check the weather yourself by searching 'weather near me' or 'weather in [your city]' on a search engine, or using a dedicated weather app.
